EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PGi, the Meetings Experts
{!Lead.FirstName},
I'm writing today to share this research brief from the Aberdeen Group on the power of incorporating video into sales meetings. As a sales leader, I thought this research would be of interest to you: Video and Collaboration: Fighting the Forgetting Curve. One stat from this brief that jumped out at me was that sales productivity (based on an average deal size per month) increased $39,000 when video meetings were used in the companies surveyed. I'd like to talk to you about how incorporating video meetings and video demos can shorten sales cycles and help you meet your quotas.
I'll give you a call soon.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Phone}
